resources.string: Are you sure you wish to end your turn?

• Highest roll begins the game
 • The game is played in a clockwise direction
 • To enter the game you need to roll a 6
 • If no pieces are in play and no 6 is rolled, you skip your turn
 • You must always move a piece the amount shown by dice
 • If a 6 is rolled you can either move 6 or enter another piece into play, and roll again
 • Upon the third 6 rolled in a row, you forfeit your turn
 • You can not land on your own piece, ERGO NO STACKING
 • If you land on another players piece, you send the piece back to the home area
 
 Official rules from:
 www.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ludo_(board_game)
